item.title: Molly's October coconut squash soup
item.description: Recipe adapted from directions and shopping hints from Molly at Farmer's Market. Molly's October squash soup Ingredients: onion garlic ginger winter squash, peeled and diced (I used butternut and delicata) coconut milk diced tomatoes stock (vegetable or chicken) Saute onion, garlic, and ginger in olive or coconut oil.  Add the squash, cook until everything smells nice and the squash is a little bit browned.   Deglaze the pan with a little wine (I used rice wine), then add diced tomatoes, coconut milk, and hot stock.
